summary.span: 提供有关当前环境和平台的信息以及操作它们的方法。

span.span: Provides information about, and means to manipulate, the current environment and platform.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类可以检索信息，如命令行参数、退出代码、环境变量设置、调用堆栈的内容、自上次系统启动以来的时间和公共语言运行时的版本。Use the class to retrieve information such as command-line arguments, the exit code, environment variable settings, contents of the call stack, time since last system boot, and the version of the common language runtime. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何显示有关当前环境的信息列表。The following example demonstrates displays a list of information about the current environment. [!code-cpp[environment.class#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.class/CPP/env0.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[environment.class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.class/CS/env0.cs#1)] [!code-vb[environment.class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.class/VB/env0.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性提供对程序名称和当前进程启动时在命令行上指定的任何参数的访问。This property provides access to the program name and any arguments specified on the command line when the current process was started. 程序名称可以包含路径信息，但这不是必需的。The program name can include path information, but is not required to do so. 使用 方法检索已分析并存储在字符串数组中的命令行信息。Use the method to retrieve the command-line information parsed and stored in an array of strings. 命令行缓冲区的最大大小未设置为特定数量的字符;这取决于计算机上运行的 Windows 操作系统。The maximum size of the command-line buffer is not set to a specific number of characters; it varies depending on the Windows operating system that is running on the computer. ## Examples 下面的示例显示其自己的命令行。The following example displays its own command line. [!code-cpp[environment.commandline#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.CommandLine/CPP/commandline.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[environment.commandline#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.CommandLine/CS/commandline.cs#1)] [!code-vb[environment.commandline#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.CommandLine/VB/commandline.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置当前工作目录的完全限定路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the fully qualified path of the current working directory.

value.span: 目录路径。

span.span: The directory path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按照定义，如果此进程在本地或网络驱动器的根目录下启动，则此属性的值为驱动器名称后跟尾随斜杠 (例如，"C： \\ " ) 。By definition, if this process starts in the root directory of a local or network drive, the value of this property is the drive name followed by a trailing slash (for example, "C:\\"). 如果此过程在子目录中启动，则此属性的值为驱动器和子目录路径，无尾随斜杠 (例如，"C:\mySubDirectory" ) 。If this process starts in a subdirectory, the value of this property is the drive and subdirectory path, without a trailing slash (for example, "C:\mySubDirectory"). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example demonstrates setting the property. summary.span: 终止此进程，并将退出代码返回到操作系统。

span.span: Terminates this process and returns an exit code to the operating system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于 `exitCode` 参数，请使用非零数字来指示错误。For the `exitCode` parameter, use a non-zero number to indicate an error. 在应用程序中，你可以在枚举中定义自己的错误代码，并根据方案返回相应的错误代码。In your application, you can define your own error codes in an enumeration, and return the appropriate error code based on the scenario. 例如，返回的值为1，表示所需的文件不存在，值为2，表示该文件的格式不正确。For example, return a value of 1 to indicate that the required file is not present, and a value of 2 to indicate that the file is in the wrong format. 有关 Windows 操作系统使用的退出代码的列表，请参阅 Windows 文档中的 " [系统错误代码](/windows/win32/debug/system-error-codes) "。For a list of exit codes used by the Windows operating system, see [System Error Codes](/windows/win32/debug/system-error-codes) in the Windows documentation. 调用 方法不同于通过以下方式使用编程语言的 `return` 语句：Calling the method differs from using your programming language's `return` statement in the following ways: - 始终终止应用程序。 always terminates an application. `return`仅当应用程序入口点（例如方法）中使用了应用程序时，才能使用该语句终止应用程序 `Main` 。Using the `return` statement may terminate an application only if it is used in the application entry point, such as in the `Main` method. - 立即终止应用程序，即使其他线程正在运行也是如此。 terminates an application immediately, even if other threads are running. 如果 `return` 在应用程序入口点调用该语句，则会使应用程序仅在所有前台线程终止后终止。If the `return` statement is called in the application entry point, it causes an application to terminate only after all foreground threads have terminated. - 要求调用方具有调用非托管代码的权限。 requires the caller to have permission to call unmanaged code. `return`语句不会。The `return` statement does not. - 如果 从 `try` 或 `catch` 块调用，则 `finally` 不会执行任何块中的代码。If is called from a `try` or `catch` block, the code in any `finally` block does not execute. 如果 `return` 使用语句，则块中的代码 `finally` 执行。If the `return` statement is used, the code in the `finally` block does execute. - 如果在 [受约束的执行区域](/dotnet/framework/performance/constrained-execution-regions) 中的代码 (CER) 正在运行时调用，则 cer 将不会完成执行。If is called when code in a [constrained execution region](/dotnet/framework/performance/constrained-execution-regions) (CER) is running, the CER will not complete execution. 如果 `return` 使用语句，则 CER 将完成执行。If the `return` statement is used, the CER completes execution.

exception.span: 调用方没有足够的安全权限来执行此函数。

span.span: The caller does not have sufficient security permission to perform this function.

summary.span: 获取或设置进程的退出代码。

span.span: Gets or sets the exit code of the process.

value.span: 包含退出代码的 32 位有符号整数。

span.span: A 32-bit signed integer containing the exit code.

value.span: 默认值为 0（零），这指示已成功完成处理。

span.span: The default value is 0 (zero), which indicates that the process completed successfully.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该 `Main` 方法返回 `void` ，则可以使用此属性来设置将返回到调用环境中的退出代码。If the `Main` method returns `void`, you can use this property to set the exit code that will be returned to the calling environment. 如果 `Main` 未返回 `void` ，则忽略此属性。If `Main` does not return `void`, this property is ignored. 此属性的初始值为零。The initial value of this property is zero. > [!WARNING] > 该 属性是一个有符号的32位整数。The property is a signed 32-bit integer. 若要防止属性返回一个负的退出代码，则不应使用大于或等于0x80000000 的值。To prevent the property from returning a negative exit code, you should not use values greater than or equal to 0x80000000. 使用非零值表示错误。Use a non-zero number to indicate an error. 在应用程序中，你可以在枚举中定义自己的错误代码，并根据方案返回相应的错误代码。In your application, you can define your own error codes in an enumeration, and return the appropriate error code based on the scenario. 例如，返回的值为1，表示所需的文件不存在，值为2，表示该文件的格式不正确。For example, return a value of 1 to indicate that the required file is not present and a value of 2 to indicate that the file is in the wrong format. 有关 Windows 操作系统使用的退出代码的列表，请参阅 Windows 文档中的 " [系统错误代码](/windows/win32/debug/system-error-codes) "。For a list of exit codes used by the Windows operating system, see [System Error Codes](/windows/win32/debug/system-error-codes) in the Windows documentation. ## Examples 下面是一个名为 Double.exe 的简单应用，它将作为命令行参数传递给它的整数值加倍。The following is a simple app named Double.exe that doubles an integer value passed to it as a command-line argument. 值将错误代码分配给 属性，以指示错误条件。The value assigns error codes to the property to indicate error conditions. 请注意，必须添加对 System.Numerics.dll 程序集的引用才能成功编译此示例。Note that you must add a reference to the System.Numerics.dll assembly to successfully compile the example. [!code-csharp[System.Environment.ExitCode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.exitcode/cs/double.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Environment.ExitCode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.exitcode/vb/double.vb#1)] 然后，可以从如下所示的批处理文件中调用该示例，这使其错误代码可以通过使用命令来访问 `ERRORLEVEL` 。The example can then be invoked from a batch file such as the following, which makes its error codes accessible by using the `ERRORLEVEL` command. ``` echo off Double.exe %1 If errorlevel 1639 goto NoArg if errorlevel 534 goto Overflow if errorlevel 160 goto BadArg if errorlevel 0 echo Completed Successfully goto :EOF :NoArg echo Missing argument goto :EOF : Overflow echo Arithmetic overflow goto :EOF :BadArg echo Invalid argument goto :EOF ``` 下面显示了通过调用批处理文件而产生的一些示例输出。The following shows some sample output produced by invoking the batch file. ``` >getdouble 123>echo offResult: 246Completed Successfully>getdouble 5912323109093>echo offArithmetic overflow>getdouble>echo offMissing argument>getdouble "a string">echo offInvalid argument ``` 请注意，Double.exe 的代码在函数中与下面的示例相同，不同之处在于前者定义了一个名为 `Main` 且没有返回值的入口点，而此示例定义了一个名为的入口点， `Main` 它返回整数。Note that code for Double.exe is identical in function to the following example, except that the former defines an entry point named `Main` that has no return value, whereas this example defines an entry point named `Main` that returns an integer. [!code-csharp[System.Environment.ExitCode#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.exitcode/cs/double1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Environment.ExitCode#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.exitcode/vb/double1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 将嵌入到指定字符串中的每个环境变量的名称替换为该变量的值的等效字符串，然后返回结果字符串。

span.span: Replaces the name of each environment variable embedded in the specified string with the string equivalent of the value of the variable, then returns the resulting string.

returns.span: 一个字符串，其中的每个环境变量均被替换为该变量的值。

span.span: A string with each environment variable replaced by its value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks COM 互操作用于从操作系统检索环境变量。COM interop is used to retrieve the environment variables from the operating system. 如果由于 COM 错误而无法检索环境变量，则将使用用于说明失败原因的 HRESULT 来生成几个可能的异常之一;也就是说，异常依赖于 HRESULT。If the environment variables cannot be retrieved due to a COM error, the HRESULT that explains the cause of the failure is used to generate one of several possible exceptions; that is, the exception depends on the HRESULT. 有关如何处理 HRESULT 的详细信息，请参阅方法的 "备注" 部分 。For more information about how the HRESULT is processed, see the Remarks section of the method. 仅对设置的环境变量进行替换。Replacement only occurs for environment variables that are set. 例如，假设 `name` 为 "MyENV =% MyENV%"。For example, suppose `name` is "MyENV = %MyENV%". 如果环境变量 MyENV 设置为42，则此方法将返回 "MyENV = 42"。If the environment variable, MyENV, is set to 42, this method returns "MyENV = 42". 如果未设置 MyENV，则不进行任何更改;此方法返回 "MyENV =% MyENV%"。If MyENV is not set, no change occurs; this method returns "MyENV = %MyENV%". 返回值的大小限制为32K。The size of the return value is limited to 32K. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取系统驱动器和系统根变量。The following example shows how to obtain the system drive and system root variables. [!code-cpp[Environment.ExpandEnvironmentVariables#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.ExpandEnvironmentVariables/CPP/expandenvironmentvariables.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Environment.ExpandEnvironmentVariables#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.ExpandEnvironmentVariables/CS/expandenvironmentvariables.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Environment.ExpandEnvironmentVariables#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.ExpandEnvironmentVariables/VB/expandenvironmentvariables.vb#1)]

summary.span: 向 Windows 的应用程序事件日志写入消息后立即终止进程，然后在发往 Microsoft 的错误报告中加入该消息。

span.span: Immediately terminates a process after writing a message to the Windows Application event log, and then includes the message in error reporting to Microsoft.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法终止进程，而不运行任何活动 `try` / `finally` 的块或终结器。This method terminates a process without running any active `try`/`finally` blocks or finalizers. `Environment.FailFast`方法将字符串写入 `message` Windows 应用程序事件日志，创建应用程序的转储，然后终止当前进程。The `Environment.FailFast` method writes the `message` string to the Windows Application event log, creates a dump of your application, and then terminates the current process. 此 `message` 字符串也包含在向 Microsoft 报告错误。The `message` string is also included in error reporting to Microsoft. 使用 `Environment.FailFast` 方法而不是 方法来终止应用程序，前提是应用程序的状态已损坏，无法修复，执行应用程序的 `try` / `finally` 块和终结器将损坏程序资源。Use the `Environment.FailFast` method instead of the method to terminate your application if the state of your application is damaged beyond repair, and executing your application's `try`/`finally` blocks and finalizers will corrupt program resources. 使用 Windows 错误报告向 Microsoft 报告信息。Information is reported to Microsoft by using Windows Error Reporting. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 错误报告：入门](/windows-hardware/drivers/dashboard/)。For more information, see [Windows Error Reporting: Getting Started](/windows-hardware/drivers/dashboard/). 调用 `Environment.FailFast` 方法以终止在 Visual Studio 调试器中运行的应用程序的执行会引发 ，并自动触发 [fatalExecutionEngineError 托管调试助手 (MDA) ](https://github.com/dotnet/docs/blob/master/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/fatalexecutionengineerror-mda.md)。Calling the `Environment.FailFast` method to terminate execution of an application running in the Visual Studio debugger throws an and automatically triggers the [fatalExecutionEngineError managed debugging assistant (MDA)](https://github.com/dotnet/docs/blob/master/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/fatalexecutionengineerror-mda.md). ## Examples 下面的示例向 Windows 应用程序事件日志中写入一个日志项，并终止当前进程。The following example writes a log entry to the Windows Application event log and terminates the current process. [!code-csharp[environment.FailFast#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.FailFast/cs/ff.cs#1)] [!code-vb[environment.FailFast#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.FailFast/vb/ff.vb#1)]

span.span: Immediately terminates a process after writing a message to the Windows Application event log, and then includes the message and exception information in error reporting to Microsoft.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法终止进程，而不运行任何活动 `try` / `finally` 的块或终结器。This method terminates the process without running any active `try`/`finally` blocks or finalizers. `Environment.FailFast`方法将字符串写入 `message` Windows 应用程序事件日志，创建应用程序的转储，然后终止当前进程。The `Environment.FailFast` method writes the `message` string to the Windows Application event log, creates a dump of your application, and then terminates the current process. 使用 Windows 错误报告向 Microsoft 报告信息。Information is reported to Microsoft by using Windows Error Reporting. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 错误报告：入门](/windows-hardware/drivers/dashboard/)。For more information, see [Windows Error Reporting: Getting Started](/windows-hardware/drivers/dashboard/). 向 Microsoft 提供错误报告包括 `message` 和 `exception` 信息，其中提供了用于分类错误的详细信息。Error reporting to Microsoft includes `message` and `exception` information, which provides details used to classify the error. 尽管 `exception` 因为进程已终止而未进行处理，但仍会获取引发异常的上下文信息。Although `exception` is not handled because the process is terminated, the contextual information that raised the exception is still obtained. 如果 `exception` 为 `null` ，或者 `exception` 不引发，则此方法与方法重载的操作相同 。If `exception` is `null`, or if `exception` is not thrown, this method operates the same as the method overload. 使用 `Environment.FailFast` 方法而不是 方法来终止应用程序，前提是应用程序的状态已损坏，无法修复，执行应用程序的 `try` / `finally` 块和终结器将损坏程序资源。Use the `Environment.FailFast` method instead of the method to terminate your application if the state of your application is damaged beyond repair, and executing your application's `try`/`finally` blocks and finalizers will corrupt program resources. 调用 `Environment.FailFast` 方法以终止在 Visual Studio 调试器中运行的应用程序的执行会引发 ，并自动触发 [fatalExecutionEngineError 托管调试助手 (MDA) ](https://github.com/dotnet/docs/blob/master/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/fatalexecutionengineerror-mda.md)。Calling the `Environment.FailFast` method to terminate execution of an application running in the Visual Studio debugger throws an and automatically triggers the [fatalExecutionEngineError managed debugging assistant (MDA)](https://github.com/dotnet/docs/blob/master/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/fatalexecutionengineerror-mda.md).

span.span: The first element is the executable file name, and the following zero or more elements contain the remaining command-line arguments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数组中的第一个元素包含执行程序的文件名。The first element in the array contains the file name of the executing program. 如果文件名不可用，则第一个元素等于 。If the file name is not available, the first element is equal to . 剩余的元素包含在命令行中输入的任何其他标记。The remaining elements contain any additional tokens entered on the command line. 在 .NET 5.0 和更高版本中，对于单文件发布，第一个元素是宿主可执行文件的名称。In .NET 5.0 and later versions, for single-file publishing, the first element is the name of the host executable. 程序文件名称可以（但不需要）包含路径信息。The program file name can, but is not required to, include path information. 命令行参数由空格分隔。Command line arguments are delimited by spaces. 您可以使用双引号 ( ") 在参数内包括空格。You can use double quotation marks (") to include spaces within an argument. 但单引号 ( ") 不提供此功能。The single quotation mark ('), however, does not provide this functionality. 如果双引号后跟两个或偶数个反斜杠，则每个后续反斜杠对将替换为一个反斜杠，并删除双引号。If a double quotation mark follows two or an even number of backslashes, each proceeding backslash pair is replaced with one backslash and the double quotation mark is removed. 如果双引号后跟奇数个反斜杠（仅包括一个反斜杠），则前面的每个配对都将替换为一个反斜杠，并删除其余反斜杠;但在这种情况下，不会删除双引号。If a double quotation mark follows an odd number of backslashes, including just one, each preceding pair is replaced with one backslash and the remaining backslash is removed; however, in this case the double quotation mark is not removed. 下表显示了如何分隔命令行参数，并将其假定 `MyApp` 为当前正在执行的应用程序。The following table shows how command line arguments can be delimited, and assumes `MyApp` as the current executing application. |命令行中的输入Input at the command line|生成的命令行参数Resulting command line arguments| |-------------------------------|--------------------------------------| |`MyApp alpha beta`|`MyApp, alpha, beta`| |`MyApp "alpha with spaces" "beta with spaces"`|`MyApp, alpha with spaces, beta with spaces`| |`MyApp 'alpha with spaces' beta`|`MyApp, 'alpha, with, spaces', beta`| |`MyApp \\\alpha \\\\"beta`|`MyApp, \\\alpha, \\beta`| |`MyApp \\\\\"alpha \"beta`|`MyApp, \\"alpha, "beta`| 若要以单个字符串的形式获取命令行，请使用 属性。To obtain the command line as a single string, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例显示应用程序的命令行参数。The following example displays the application's command line arguments. [!code-cpp[Environment.GetCommandLineArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.GetCommandLineArgs/CPP/getcommandlineargs.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Environment.GetCommandLineArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.GetCommandLineArgs/CS/getcommandlineargs.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Environment.GetCommandLineArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.GetCommandLineArgs/VB/getcommandlineargs.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法只从当前进程的环境块中检索环境变量。The method retrieves an environment variable from the environment block of the current process only. 它等效于 使用值调用方法 `target` 。It is equivalent to calling the method with a `target` value of . 若要检索所有环境变量及其值，请调用 方法。To retrieve all environment variables along with their values, call the method. 环境变量名称在 Linux 和 macOS 上区分大小写，但在 Windows 上不区分大小写。Environment variable names are case-sensitive on Linux and macOS but are not case-sensitive on Windows. ### 在 Windows 系统上On Windows systems 在 Windows 系统中，当前进程的环境块包括：On Windows systems, the environment block of the current process includes: - 由创建它的父进程为其提供的所有环境变量。All environment variables that are provided to it by the parent process that created it. 例如，从控制台窗口启动的 .NET 应用程序继承了控制台窗口的所有环境变量。For example, a .NET application launched from a console window inherits all of the console window's environment variables. 如果没有父进程，则改用每个计算机和每个用户的环境变量。If there is no parent process, per-machine and per-user environment variables are used instead. 例如，新的控制台窗口包含启动时定义的每个计算机和每个用户的环境变量。For example, a new console window has all per-machine and per-user environment variables defined at the time it was launched. - 当进程正在运行时，通过 使用值调用方法或方法，添加到进程块的任何变量 `target` 。Any variables added to the process block while the process is running by calling either the method or the method with a `target` value of . 这些环境变量将一直保持到 .NET 应用程序终止为止。These environment variables persist until the .NET application terminates. 如果在进程启动之后创建环境变量，则可以使用此方法只检索通过调用 方法或 使用 `target` 值的方法创建的那些 变量。If environment variables are created after the process has started, you can use this method to retrieve only those variables that were created by calling the method or the method with a `target` value of .. ### 在 macOS 和 Linux 系统上On macOS and Linux systems 在 macOS 和 Linux 上，当前进程的环境块包含以下环境变量：On macOS and Linux, the environment block of the current process includes the following environment variables: - 由创建它的父进程为其提供的所有环境变量。All environment variables that are provided to it by the parent process that created it. 对于从 shell 启动的 .NET 应用程序，这包括 shell 中定义的所有环境变量。For .NET applications launched from a shell, this includes all environment variables defined in the shell. - 当进程正在运行时，通过 使用值调用方法或方法，添加到进程块的任何变量 `target` 。Any variables added to the process block while the process is running by calling either the method or the method with a `target` value of . 这些环境变量将一直保持到 .NET 应用程序终止为止。These environment variables persist until the .NET application terminates. MacOS 和 Linux 上的 .NET Core 不支持每计算机或每用户环境变量。.NET Core on macOS and Linux does not support per-machine or per-user environment variables. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法来检索 `windir` 包含 Windows 目录路径的环境变量。The following example uses the method to retrieve the `windir` environment variable, which contains the path of the Windows directory. [!code-cpp[System.Environment#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Environment/CPP/Vars1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Environment#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Environment/CS/Vars1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Environment#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Environment/VB/Vars1.vb#4)] 下面的示例尝试 `Test1` 从进程环境块中检索名为的环境变量的值。The following example attempts to retrieve the value of an environment variable named `Test1` from the process environment block. 如果该变量不存在，则该示例将创建其并检索其值。If the variable doesn't exist, the example creates its and retrieves its value. 该示例显示变量的值。The example displays the value of the variable. 如果该示例创建了变量，它还将对 枚举的每个成员调用方法， 以确定只能从当前进程环境块检索变量。If the example created the variable, it also calls the method with each member of the enumeration to establish that the variable can be retrieved only from the current process environment block. 最后，如果该示例创建了变量，则将其删除。Finally, if the example created the variable, it deletes it. [!code-csharp[System.Environment.GetEnvironmentVariable#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.getenvironmentvariable/cs/getenvironmentvariableex1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Environment.GetEnvironmentVariable#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.getenvironmentvariable/vb/getenvironmentvariableex1.vb)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要检索所有环境变量及其值，请调用 方法。To retrieve all environment variables along with their values, call the method. 环境变量名称在 Linux 和 macOS 上区分大小写，但在 Windows 上不区分大小写。Environment variable names are case-sensitive on Linux and macOS but are not case-sensitive on Windows. ### 在 Windows 系统上On Windows systems 在 Windows 上， `target` 参数指定是从当前进程还是从当前用户或本地计算机的 Windows 操作系统注册表项检索环境变量。On Windows, the `target` parameter specifies whether the environment variable is retrieved from the current process or from the Windows operating system registry key for the current user or local machine. 所有基于用户和每台计算机的环境变量都将自动复制到当前进程的环境块中，这与创建 .NET 进程的父进程可用的任何其他环境变量一样。All per-user and per-machine environment variables are automatically copied into the environment block of the current process, as are any other environment variables that are available to the parent process that created the .NET process. 但是，通过在 进程的持续时间内调用方法或方法（其 `target` 值 仅为持久性），只会将环境变量添加到当前进程的环境块。However, environment variables added only to the environment block of the current process by calling either the method or the method with a `target` value of persist only for the duration of the process. ### 在 macOS 和 Linux 系统上On macOS and Linux systems 在 macOS 和 Linux 上， `GetEnvironmentVariable(String, EnvironmentVariableTarget)` 方法只支持 `target` 值 。On macOS and Linux, the `GetEnvironmentVariable(String, EnvironmentVariableTarget)` method supports a `target` value of only. `target`不支持值为或的调用 ，返回 `null` 。Calls with a `target` value of or are not supported and return `null`. 每进程环境变量为：Per-process environment variables are: - 继承自父进程的那些对象，通常是用于调用 `dotnet.exe` 或启动 .net 应用程序的 shell。Those inherited from the parent process, typically the shell used to invoke `dotnet.exe` or to launch the .NET application. - 通过 使用值调用方法或方法定义的 `target` 。Those defined by calling either the method or the method with a `target` value of . 这些环境变量仅在 `dotnet` 进程或 .net 应用程序终止之前保持。These environment variables persist only until the `dotnet` process or the .NET application terminates. ## Examples 下面的示例为 、和目标创建环境变量 ，检查操作系统注册表是否包含用户和计算机环境变量，然后删除环境变量。The following example creates environment variables for the , , and targets, checks whether the operating system registry contains the user and machine environment variables, then deletes the environment variables. 由于基于 Unix 的系统上的 .NET 不支持每用户和每台计算机的环境变量，因此只有 和 值才能 成功地将环境变量存储到进程环境块。Because .NET on Unix-based systems does not support per-user and per-machine environment variables, only and with a value of successfully store an environment variable to the process environment block. remarks.format: ## Remarks 环境变量的名称和值作为键值对存储在返回的中 。The names and values for the environment variables are stored as key-value pairs in the returned . ### 在 Windows 系统上On Windows systems 在 Windows 系统上，此 `GetEnvironmentVariables` 方法返回以下环境变量：On Windows systems, the `GetEnvironmentVariables` method returns the following environment variables: - 创建进程时定义的每个计算机环境变量及其值。All per-machine environment variables that are defined at the time the process is created, along with their values. - 创建进程时定义的所有每用户环境变量及其值。All per-user environment variables that are defined at the time the process is created, along with their values. - 从父进程继承的任何变量，从该进程中启动 .NET 应用程序，或在进程运行时将其添加到进程块。Any variables inherited from the parent process from which the .NET application was launched or added to the process block while the process is running. 通过调用 方法或 `target` 值为的方法，在进程运行时添加环境变量 。Environment variables are added while the process is running by calling either the method or the method with a `target` value of . ### 在 macOS 和 Linux 系统上On macOS and Linux systems 在 MacOS 和 Linux 上， `GetEnvironmentVariables` 方法会检索从启动进程的父进程中继承的 `dotnet` 或在进程本身的作用域内定义的所有环境变量的名称和值 `dotnet` 。On MacOS and Linux, the `GetEnvironmentVariables` method retrieves the name and value of all environment variables that are inherited from the parent process that launched the `dotnet` process or that are defined within the scope of the `dotnet` process itself. `dotnet`进程结束后，后面的后一种环境变量将停止存在。Once the `dotnet` process ends, these latter environment variables cease to exist. 在基于 Unix 的系统上运行的 .NET Core 不支持每计算机或每用户环境变量。.NET Core running on Unix-based systems does not support per-machine or per-user environment variables. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 方法。The following example demonstrates the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检索系统特殊文件夹的路径，例如，可用于访问常见信息的程序文件、程序、系统或启动。This method retrieves the path to a system special folder, such as Program Files, Programs, System, or Startup, which can be used to access common information. 默认情况下，特殊文件夹由系统设置，或在安装 Windows 版本时由用户显式设置。Special folders are set by default by the system, or explicitly by the user, when installing a version of Windows. `folder`参数指定要检索的特殊文件夹，并且必须是枚举中的值之一 ; 其他任何值都会引发异常。The `folder` parameter designates the special folder to retrieve and must be one of the values in the enumeration; any other value throws an exception. 有关特殊文件夹的详细信息，请参阅 [CSIDL](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=116664) 值主题。For more information about special folders, see the [CSIDL](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=116664) values topic. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法返回并显示与参数关联的路径 `folder` 。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to return and display the path associated with the `folder` parameter. span.span: A folder will not physically exist if the operating system did not create it, the existing folder was deleted, or the folder is a virtual directory, such as My Computer, which does not correspond to a physical path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检索系统特殊文件夹的路径，例如，可用于访问常见信息的程序文件、程序、系统或启动。This method retrieves the path to a system special folder, such as Program Files, Programs, System, or Startup, which can be used to access common information. 默认情况下，特殊文件夹由系统设置，或在安装 Windows 版本时由用户显式设置。Special folders are set by default by the system, or explicitly by the user, when installing a version of Windows. `folder`参数指定要检索的特殊文件夹，并且必须是枚举中的值之一 ; 其他任何值都会引发异常。The `folder` parameter designates the special folder to retrieve and must be one of the values in the enumeration; any other value throws an exception. 有关特殊文件夹的详细信息，请参阅 [CSIDL](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=116664) 值主题。For more information about special folders, see the [CSIDL](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=116664) values topic.

value.span: 如果当前的应用程序域正在卸载或者 CLR 正在关闭，则为;否则为 。

span.span: if the current application domain is being unloaded or the CLR is shutting down; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks **仅 .NET Framework**：当 CLR 卸载应用程序域时，它将对在该应用程序域中具有终结器方法的所有对象运行终结器。**.NET Framework only**: When the CLR unloads an application domain, it runs the finalizers on all objects that have a finalizer method in that application domain. CLR 关闭时，它将在具有终结器方法的所有对象上启动终结器线程。When the CLR shuts down, it starts the finalizer thread on all objects that have a finalizer method. 属性仅在 `true` 终结器线程启动后返回。The property returns `true` only after the finalizer thread has been started. 当属性返回时 `true` ，可以通过调用方法来确定应用程序域是否正在卸载或者 CLR 本身是否正在关闭 。When the property returns `true`, you can determine whether an application domain is being unloaded or the CLR itself is shutting down by calling the method. `true`如果因为应用程序域正在卸载或者 CLR 正在关闭而调用终结器，则此方法返回 `false` 。This method returns `true` if finalizers are called because the application domain is unloading or `false` if the CLR is shutting down. `false` 如果终结器线程尚未启动，则属性将返回。The property returns `false` if the finalizer thread has not been started. 通过使用此属性，您可以确定是否在终止代码中访问静态变量。By using this property, you can determine whether to access static variables in your finalization code. 如果应用程序域或 CLR 正在关闭，则无法可靠地访问包含终止方法并且由静态字段引用的任何对象。If either an application domain or the CLR is shutting down, you cannot reliably access any object that has a finalization method and that is referenced by a static field. 这是因为这些对象可能已经完成了。This is because these objects may have already been finalized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法等效于 使用参数的值调用重载 `target` 。Calling this method is equivalent to calling the overload with a value of for the `target` argument. 如果 `value` 参数不为空 (请参阅本节稍后部分中的 "为空值的定义删除环境变量) " 和参数命名的环境变量不 `variable` 存在，创建环境变量并为其分配内容 `value` 。If the `value` argument is not empty (see the discussion of deleting an environment variable later in this section for the definition of an empty value) and the environment variable named by the `variable` parameter does not exist, the environment variable is created and assigned the contents of `value`. 如果它存在，则修改其值。If it does exist, its value is modified. 由于环境变量是在当前进程的环境块中定义的，因此在进程结束后，它不会持久保存。Because the environment variable is defined in the environment block of the current process only, it does not persist after the process has ended. 如果 `variable` 包含非初始的十六进制零字符，则在零字符之前的字符被视为环境变量名称，而所有后续字符都将被忽略。If `variable` contains a non-initial hexadecimal zero character, the characters before the zero character are considered the environment variable name and all subsequent characters are ignored. 如果 `value` 包含非初始的十六进制零字符，则零字符之前的字符将被分配给环境变量，并且所有后续字符都将被忽略。If `value` contains a non-initial hexadecimal zero character, the characters before the zero character are assigned to the environment variable and all subsequent characters are ignored. 如果 `value` 为空且名为的环境变量 `variable` 存在，则将删除环境变量。If `value` is empty and the environment variable named by `variable` exists, the environment variable is deleted. 如果不 `variable` 存在，即使无法执行该操作，也不会发生错误。If `variable` does not exist, no error occurs even though the operation cannot be performed. `value` 在下列任一情况下，都被视为空：`value` is considered empty under any of the following conditions: - 它是 `null` 。It is `null`. - 它是 。It is . - 它包含值为 U + 0000 的单个字符。It consists of a single character whose value is U+0000. ## Examples 下面的示例尝试 `Test1` 从进程环境块中检索名为的环境变量的值。The following example attempts to retrieve the value of an environment variable named `Test1` from the process environment block. 如果该变量不存在，则此示例将创建变量并检索其值。If the variable doesn't exist, the example creates the variable and retrieves its value. 该示例显示变量的值。The example displays the value of the variable. 对于在 Windows 系统上运行的 .NET 实现，它还将调用 方法和枚举的每个成员， 以确定只能从当前进程环境块检索变量。For .NET implementations running on Windows systems, it also calls the method with each member of the enumeration to establish that the variable can be retrieved only from the current process environment block. 基于 Unix 的系统上的 ( .NET 实现仅支持进程环境块中的变量。 ) 最后，如果该示例创建了该变量，则将删除该变量。(.NET implementations on Unix-based systems only support variables in the process environment block.) Finally, if the example created the variable, it deletes it. 0000 的单个字符。It consists of a single character whose value is U+0000. 如果不 `variable` 存在，则不会发生任何错误，但无法执行该操作。If `variable` does not exist, no error occurs although the operation cannot be performed. 当是时 `target` ，请小心，因为你可能会意外删除影响整个本地计算机的环境变量，而不只是当前进程或用户。Be careful when `target` is , because you can accidentally delete an environment variable that affects your entire local machine, not just the current process or user. ### Windows 系统上的 EnvironmentVariableTarget 和 EnvironmentVariableTargetEnvironmentVariableTarget.Machine and EnvironmentVariableTarget.User on Windows systems 如果 `target` 为 ，则将环境变量存储在本地计算机注册表的 HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Environment 密钥中。If `target` is , the environment variable is stored in the HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Environment key of the local computer's registry. 它还会复制到以当前用户身份运行的文件资源管理器实例。It is also copied to instances of File Explorer that are running as the current user. 然后，用户从文件资源管理器启动的任何新进程都将继承该环境变量。The environment variable is then inherited by any new processes that the user launches from File Explorer. 同样，如果 `target` 为 ，则将环境变量存储在本地计算机注册表的 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\ControlSet001\Control\Session Manager\Environment 密钥中。Similarly, if `target` is , the environment variable is stored in the HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\ControlSet001\Control\Session Manager\Environment key of the local computer's registry. 它还会复制到文件资源管理器的所有实例。It is also copied to all instances of File Explorer. 然后，环境变量由从文件资源管理器启动的任何新进程继承。The environment variable is then inherited by any new processes that are launched from File Explorer. 如果 `target` 为 或 ，则由 Windows 消息通知其他应用程序的设置操作 `WM_SETTINGCHANGE` 。If `target` is or , other applications are notified of the set operation by a Windows `WM_SETTINGCHANGE` message. 如果 `target` 为 或 ，则建议长度 `value` 小于2048个字符。If `target` is or , we recommend that the length of `value` be less than 2048 characters. ## Examples 下面的示例为 、和目标创建环境变量 ，检查操作系统注册表是否包含用户和计算机环境变量，然后删除环境变量。The following example creates environment variables for the , , and targets, checks whether the operating system registry contains the user and machine environment variables, then deletes the environment variables. 由于基于 Unix 的系统上的 .NET 不支持每用户和每台计算机的环境变量，因此只有 和 值才能 成功地将环境变量存储到进程环境块。Because .NET on Unix-based systems does not support per-user and per-machine environment variables, only and with a value of successfully store an environment variable to the process environment block. summary.span: 获取当前的堆栈跟踪信息。

span.span: Gets current stack trace information.

value.span: 包含堆栈跟踪信息的字符串。

span.span: A string containing stack trace information.

value.span: 此值可为 。

span.span: This value can be .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性以反向时间顺序列出方法调用，也就是说，最新的方法调用将首先进行描述，并为堆栈上的每个方法调用列出一条堆栈跟踪信息。The property lists method calls in reverse chronological order, that is, the most recent method call is described first, and one line of stack trace information is listed for each method call on the stack. 但是， 由于优化期间发生的代码转换，属性可能不会按预期方式报告任意数量的方法调用。However, the property might not report as many method calls as expected due to code transformations that occur during optimization. > [!NOTE] > 对于类的堆栈跟踪信息，请使用 类。For a hierarchical view of the stack trace information by class, use the class. 属性为每个方法调用设置堆栈跟踪信息的格式，如下所示：The property formats the stack trace information for each method call as follows: "位置 `FullClassName` 。 `MethodName` (`MethodParams`) `FileName` ：行 `LineNumber` ""at `FullClassName`.`MethodName`(`MethodParams`) in `FileName` :line `LineNumber` " 文本 "at" 前面有三个空格，如果调试符号不可用，则省略以 "in" 开头的整个子字符串。The literal "at" is preceded by three spaces, and the entire substring starting with "in" is omitted if debug symbols are not available. 占位符、、 `FullClassName` `MethodName` 、、 `MethodParams` `FileName` 和 `LineNumber` 将替换为实际值，并按如下所示定义：The placeholders, `FullClassName`, `MethodName`, `MethodParams`, `FileName`, and `LineNumber`, are replaced by actual values, and are defined as follows: `FullClassName` 类的完整名称，包括命名空间。`FullClassName` The full name of the class, including the namespace. `MethodName` 方法的名称。`MethodName` The name of the method. `MethodParams` 参数类型/名称对的列表。`MethodParams` The list of parameter type/name pairs. 每个对由逗号分隔 ( "，" ) 。Each pair is separated by a comma (","). 如果不使用参数，则忽略此信息 `MethodName` 。This information is omitted if `MethodName` takes no parameters. `FileName` 声明方法的源文件的名称 `MethodName` 。`FileName` The name of the source file where the `MethodName` method is declared. 如果调试符号不可用，则忽略此信息。This information is omitted if debug symbols are not available. `LineNumber` 中的行号 `FileName` ，其中包含 `MethodName` 调用堆栈上的指令的源代码。`LineNumber` The number of the line in `FileName` that contains the source code from `MethodName` for the instruction that is on the call stack. 如果调试符号不可用，则忽略此信息。This information is omitted if debug symbols are not available. 字符串终止堆栈跟踪的每一行。The string terminates each line of the stack trace. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了 属性。The following example demonstrates the property. summary.span: 获取系统启动后经过的毫秒数。

span.span: Gets the number of milliseconds elapsed since the system started.

value.span: 一个 32 位带符号整数，它包含自上次启动计算机以来所经过的时间（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: A 32-bit signed integer containing the amount of time in milliseconds that has passed since the last time the computer was started.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值派生自系统计时器，并存储为32位有符号整数。The value of this property is derived from the system timer and is stored as a 32-bit signed integer. 请注意，因为它是从系统计时器派生的，所以，属性的分辨率 限制为系统计时器的分辨率，这通常在10到16毫秒的范围内。Note that, because it is derived from the system timer, the resolution of the property is limited to the resolution of the system timer, which is typically in the range of 10 to 16 milliseconds. > [!IMPORTANT] > 由于属性值的值 为32位有符号整数，因此，如果系统连续运行，则 将从零递增到 约24.9 天，然后跳转到 ，该数字为负数，然后在下一个24.9 天内递增为零。Because the value of the property value is a 32-bit signed integer, if the system runs continuously, will increment from zero to for approximately 24.9 days, then jump to , which is a negative number, then increment back to zero during the next 24.9 days. 若要解决此问题，可以调用 Windows [GetTickCount](/windows/win32/api/sysinfoapi/nf-sysinfoapi-gettickcount) 函数，该函数在大约49.7 天后将重置为零，或调用 [GetTickCount64](/windows/win32/api/sysinfoapi/nf-sysinfoapi-gettickcount64) 函数。You can work around this issue by calling the Windows [GetTickCount](/windows/win32/api/sysinfoapi/nf-sysinfoapi-gettickcount) function, which resets to zero after approximately 49.7 days, or by calling the [GetTickCount64](/windows/win32/api/sysinfoapi/nf-sysinfoapi-gettickcount64) function. 与 属性不同，后者是自1/1/0001，12： 00 (以来经过的100纳秒间隔数。 is different from the property, which is the number of 100-nanosecond intervals that have elapsed since 1/1/0001, 12:00am. 使用 属性可获取此计算机上的当前本地日期和时间。Use the property to obtain the current local date and time on this computer. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检索由属性返回的值的正范围 。The following example demonstrates how to retrieve the positive range of values returned by the property. 属性在之间循环 ，这是一个负数， 每49.8 天一次。The property cycles between , which is a negative number, and once every 49.8 days. 此代码示例将删除符号位以产生一个介于零和 每24.9 天之间循环一次的非负数。This code sample removes the sign bit to yield a nonnegative number that cycles between zero and once every 24.9 days. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.TickCount/CPP/tickcount.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.TickCount/CS/tickcount.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.TickCount/VB/tickcount.vb" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户的域帐户凭据的格式为用户的域名、" \\ " 字符和用户名。The domain account credentials for a user are formatted as the user's domain name, the '\\' character, and user name. 使用 属性获取用户的域名而不使用用户名，并使用 属性获取不带域名的用户名。Use the property to obtain the user's domain name without the user name, and the property to obtain the user name without the domain name. 例如，如果用户的域名和用户名为 CORPORATENETWORK\john，则 属性将返回 "企业网络"。For example, if a user's domain name and user name are CORPORATENETWORK\john, the property returns "CORPORATENETWORK". 属性首先尝试获取当前用户的 Windows 帐户名称的域名部分。The property first attempts to get the domain name component of the Windows account name for the current user. 如果此尝试失败，则此属性将尝试获取与属性提供的用户名相关联的域名 。If that attempt fails, this property attempts to get the domain name associated with the user name provided by the property. 如果此尝试失败，因为主机未加入域，则返回主机名。If that attempt fails because the host computer is not joined to a domain, then the host computer name is returned.
